text: This chapter shall not be construed to exempt natural gas suppliers from otherwise applicable District of Columbia or federal consumer protection laws.

chapter.text: Retail Natural Gas Supplier Licensing and Consumer Protection.

heading.catch_text: Application of District of Columbia and federal consumer protection laws.
